welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Saarlouis, Germany! Known for its rich history and beautiful architecture, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the delights our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ensheim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ensheim Airport, primarily used for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zweibrücken Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
